text: The Europe Together (), abbreviated to ESO, is a political party in the Czech Republic. It was founded by Jaromír Štětina in February 2019. On 7 February 2019, Štětina announced the party's candidates for 2019 European election. Štětina stated that party would join European People's Party if elected. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:TOP 09 Category:Political parties established in 2019 Category:Pro-European political parties in the Czech Republic
title: Europe Together
